credit_line: Gift of Mary E. Dreier from the estate of Katherine S. Dreier
title: Textile
medium:
Medium: silk on cotton
Technique: satin stitch embroidery on plain weave, cutwork
description: Narrow rectangle of undyed fabric with black and white bobbin lace on three sides and a deep band made up of rows of stylized black silk floral embroidery with elaborated corner motifs. Some cutwork guard borders and open work detail. Faced under embroidery with scarlet wool cloth.
name: Textile
